title: Zarr Conventions Specification
description: JSON schema for validating Zarr conventions metadata

zarr_conventions_version.description: A semver-compatible string indicating the version of the Zarr conventions specification

zarr_conventions.description: Array of convention registration objects, each containing a single UUID-to-metadata mapping

version.description: A semver-compatible string indicating the version of the convention

name.description: A short human-readable name used to represent the Convention

schema.description: A URL which resolves to a JSON schema document describing the convention's properties

spec.description: A URL which resolves to a document describing the Convention in more detail

description.description: A concise description of the convention
